FooterTexto: Bringing together teachers and students from around the world through technology designed to provide a quality education.
ContactDesc: We are here to answer any questions you may have
ServiceIntro: With our software you will have an effective and efficient solution when contracting private lessons.
ServiceFirstDivHeader: Team with experience in the area
ServiceFirstDivDesc: Our team consists of professionals with experience in the educational area, through this we achieve the perfect union between education and technology.
ServiceSecondtDivDesc: Through our solution the student will have a safe place through which he can hire private classes, adapting to the needs of the student.
ServiceThirdDivDesc: Through our software teachers will have total freedom to establish the cost of class time, mode, payment method, etc. You can count on our total support for any problem that may arise.
TeamIntro: Team specialized in providing solutions in the area of education, using the latest technologies available.
TeamFirstDivDesc: At the time of developing this solution we have a work team, which consists mostly of teachers, who guide us in this process, and help us build the best possible tools.
TeamSecondDivDesc: The team in charge of developing this software has a long history of designing customized solutions, innovating and learning continuously.
AboutIntro: We are a young company that was born with a single purpose, to provide a technological solution to a problem that affects countless students, who are in need of hiring private lessons.

SuccessSignUp: Successful registration. Welcome to our community!
SuccessMessageSignUp: Activate your user through the link we send to your email
GradingSubTitle: Here you can upload those documents that validate your education, once your profile is validated it will reflect it. Thank you very much!
